description:
Ray is super friendly and a smart guy. He spent his youth playing soccer, and now spends most of his time cycling, which further attributes to his lean muscular build.
He's got some acting talent, and I love his video and photos because he was completely comfortable in front of the camera, and he's one of those dudes that "invites" you to come suck his dick.
He's only 5'7", and his dick is pretty big, but looks even bigger on his small frame.
He showed up with a full beard, which I don't have too much on the site. We trimmed it back a bit for the video portion, but of course left all that great body hair intact. If you love red bush, you will totally dig Ray!
title: Ray - Solo
